title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4622 - General Conduct Of Games Of Chance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4622 - General Conduct Of Games Of Chance

State Regulations
§ 4622.1 - Duties of member in charge
§ 4622.2 - Minors
§ 4622.3 - Restriction on participation
§ 4622.4 - Designation of officer responsible for utilization of games of chance monies
§ 4622.5 - Payment of person conducting games; gifts, donations prohibited
§ 4622.6 - Compensation of bookkeepers and accountants
§ 4622.7 - Admission of general public; charge optional
§ 4622.8 - Premises open to inspection
§ 4622.9 - Ownership of devices and equipment
§ 4622.10 - Sale of merchandise prohibited
§ 4622.11 - Sale of New York State Lottery tickets
§ 4622.12 - Maximum value of prizes offered
§ 4622.13 - Value of merchandise prizes
§ 4622.14 - Gifts prohibited
§ 4622.15 - Admission charge as a requisite to participate
§ 4622.16 - Property not permitted as prizes
§ 4622.17 - Unapproved buildings
§ 4622.18 - Rental payment due
§ 4622.19 - Badges
§ 4622.20 - Persons prohibited as players
§ 4622.21 - Cashing of checks prohibited
§ 4622.22 - Operation of bank
§ 4622.23 - Sale and consumption of alcoholic beverages
§ 4622.24 - Rules and bulletins available at games
§ 4622.25 - Qualifications of members in charge and assistants
§ 4622.26 - Advertising games of chance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4622

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, art. 19-B, § 435; General Municipal Law, arts. 9-A, 14-H, §§ 186, 188-a; L. 1976, ch. 960
